index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the HOME program; authorizing submission of a Program Description to the U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development ("HUD") for 1994 HOME funds; authorizing a grant agreement with HUD; accepting and appropriating $3,086,000.00 in 1994 HOME funds; reallocating $350,000 in 1992 HOME funds accepted under Ordinance 116292 from rental assistance to other housing programs; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
committee: Housing, Community Development and Urban Environment
